name: Morris Park Inn
address: 1024 Morris Park Ave, Bronx, NY 10461, USA

reviews.text: Love this spot..food is amazing‚Ä¶. everyone‚Äôs super friendly always inviting by everyone great vibe

A stronghold bar of Morris Park. A great spot to catch the Yankee game in a chill cool atmosphere. We‚Äôre friendly Hospital service. Don‚Äôt skip on the burger or the Philly eggroll I get two orders always.
Es un buen lugar para ir a pasar un buen rato. Un lugar seguro y la gente que va a este lugar son regulares y se acercan a ti y te dan la bienvenida al lugar. As√≠ que eso estuvo genial.

Divey bar. Good regulars that are always so kind and engaging. But the people that work there, especially the older white female bartender have such a wack personalities. They just don‚Äôt seem like bar people lol. I honestly wonder how some bars hire bartenders. They usually have such good vibes and set the mood. But yeah, no, this place ain‚Äôt it. don‚Äôt come here to feel welcomed by the workersüôÑjust come here for cheap drinks and the bar folks.
Amazing service!
Don‚Äôt ever eat there
Great place...good food üëå

Ordered the Penne Ala Vodka with chicken. There was no sauce on the pasta and the chicken tasted like it had buffalo sauce in it with a little bit of sauce. Don't recommend. I took a chance and it was horrible.
Great neighborhood bar, good food, and good people ! Thanks
Only been here a few times. Great local spot.
Most fun I had in a while üáµüá∑üî•‚ù§Ô∏èü§£
The place was super cool. Chris the bartender was an absolute wonder, we loved her so much. Thank you love ‚ù§Ô∏è
Local bar with DJ really good music even a juke box. Bartender wonderful very welcoming of my friend Roxy for her Birthday celebration

This is the best restaurant in the world I'm celebrity chef Ricky everybody hospitality is beautiful ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è and I would never stopped going there you will go to the Morris Park Italian restaurant
Morris Park inn it's a bar restaurants. It seems good place.

What a lovely place to have stumbled upon. I noticed it walking by and the next day I ordered some food. I got the burger with sweet potatoes fries and wife got the fried shrimp. The burger was very good along with the fries and my wife loved the shrimp. Glad i found this place.

So i came out the gym craving a burger today, once i stepped in the place itself just filled me with a wholesome local aura. The patrons seemed like usuals which were a good vibe as well. My server Stef was amazing and made me feel comfortable once i settled in a nice cozy booth. The burger was exquisite and exactly to my liking. I had a medium rare angus beef burger with cheddar; topped with saut√©ed onions, bacon, lettuce, and tomato; as well as a side of sweet potato fries. I will definitely be back to try the MPI burger i believe it was called which is a bigger burger than what i had order. Thank you guys !!
24 hrs
Great food friendly service
love this place. a hidden gem
To say the least I stumbled in and it was an amazing time thank you guys for making my night
Love the bartender Christina is awesome and treats customers like family
Always a great experience. Food delicious üòã and the environment entertertaiining. Good place with good people
Dj was excellent
Good for a quick bite! The place has booths instead of tables. It is more suitable just to have some drinks with friends after work.
Food and drinks are always great. Love stopping in here from time to time.

3 stars because the food was good however the service sucked- we were there for over 2 hours because our 1st served Christine, forgot to enter one of our appetizers that we had to wait for.  They were more concerned with their bingo night‚Ä¶
Outdoor and indoor seating. Great to see friends there.
Small neighborhood bar. Friendly people and great staff. Had a good time there.
Is there a happy hour? What days and times?

Unexpected visit and I was very pleased. My friend and I were welcomed, immediately. The waitress was very attentive and informative. I had the grilled chicken wrap, which was very delicious. Overall their menu, is affordable. Can‚Äôt wait to go back!

My first time there and I was DELIGHTED  . The food is amazing . The staff is so so nice and attentive . I had the chicken sandwich with avocado - bacon /  L&T and their secret sauce . It was TO DIE for . Lean and fresh ingredients .
Tie the bartender was great!!!
Shout out to Tie! The bartender! Only one serving and was doing a great job!
Demasiado genial el lugar , la m√∫sica y las bebidas
DJ Radar on Saturday!!!!!
Fun bar, fun atmosphere.
It's very rare to find a good bar in the Bronx. This place is really a hidden rare gem.  The food was delicious, the service was great and the atmosphere is a good vibe with super friendly people.
Great bar/pub.drinks and food are great and the prices are excellent.met some very nice people.

This place never disappoints, I love the food, atmosphere and amazing service‚Ä¶ Christine is a gem, love her dedication to her customers, treats everyone with kindness‚Ä¶ She‚Äôs always on point with the food recommendations and you will have the best experience at the Bar. Thank you Christine!!!!

I love this bar simply because of the fact that it is SUCH a safe haven. Youre always in good hands. As a woman, i truly appreciate it. Im a long time morris parkite and im telling you, its the right place:)

Only 4 starring because the menu is outdated in my opinion. People like vegetarian options and i will say all we get is fried food :( the menu is great for everyone else... i guess :/

i have come here yesterday and today thursday the woman after 8:00 is dissatisfied with me probably because i am latin , she never seems to want to serve me , wait more than 10 minutes for her to ask if i want to drink something ,,, before the entrance of she the other bartenders have been good to me
The best place for the family üòÉ best chicken üçó wings ever, Jas makes the best üòã wings.
Great for Burger's, Tacos, you name it. Going to miss Joe the Bartender as he moves on to new Horizons!
Very good place to hang out and eat at. Music playlist very good.
Great place to have a great time food is fantastic
Great burgers on certain days happy atmosphere
Good affordable food great pork chops marsala and sausage brocoli and pasta
Decent American food

Decent. Waitress/woman behind the bar (bad w| names) was really nice. Thai chili Wings & truffle fries were good, as well. It was karaoke night & very lively, also. I'll keep that in mind for next time.

What a great bar! The ambience and food are amazing! This is the place to be especially when you want to watch your favorite team - there are so many TVs!! Wings, football, beer. AMAZING! You have to come check this place out!

Met a friend for "a quick drink" which turned into dinner, and karaoke. But who's complaining?! Christine was our bartender for the beginning of our shift and she was absolutely amazing, I ordered the Mediterranean Salad with Shrimp and it was honestly pretty amazing. The shrimp were grilled, but actually grilled. There was a nice charred crust on them. My friend had lemon pepper wings and Fish tacos which she loved as well. If you're watching your waistline ask for the dressing on the side üòâ. It was really really good and hard to resist. Drinks were great ! Karaoke was fun. Jasmine was our bartender for the 2nd half of our shift and she was just as amazing with her drink recommendations. Neighborhood bars don't always get enough credit, give them a try you will not be disappointed.

I celebrated my birthday by going to lunch with a friend. The drinks and food were both excellent. Denise was great, just the proper amount of alcohol! She significantly improved our stay there by seeing to it that we were taken care of.

My friend and I went to have lunch for my birthday. The food was delicious, the drinks were on point. Just the right amount of alcohol, Denise was the best! She made sure that we were taken care of, she really made our experience there.

I made a huge mistake when I decided to visit this restaurant. They weren't attentive at all. My family and I were there for almost an hour and a half and they only checked on us ONCE - and the "check in" was very quick and from afar. They‚Ä¶

Outstanding food and atmosphere. Burger was tasty and they don't cheap out on the onion rings. Also, get tge soft pretzel. Biggest pretzel I have ever had. Service was excellent. Joey is a fantastic owner. Definitely will come back.

Good selection of draft beer.  Excellent food and finger food, especially the Bavarian style giant pretzel..  Wings and fried pickles are great as well. Pleasant atmosphere Lots of TVs.  A definite plus to the neighborhood. Definitely stop by and check it out.

The best bar food in the area!!! This place is so underrated.
They have huge portions, great prices and delicious food.
The service is great and fast.
Definitely one of the best burgers ive ever had, not to mention the rest of the menu items.
Btw, get the giant pretzel! Its huge and delicious and enough to share!

Today was the first but for sure not the last coming here. Everything was fantastic from the company & food to the atmosphere, everything was great. I was sold from the moment I saw there were fried pickles ! Jasmine @ the bar was great! Get you a margarita or two or four Thank you ‚ô•Ô∏è

I came here and have the best margarita ever. I saw Jennifer( the bartender) squeezing some fresh lime juice for my drink which was made with real Patrone and that‚Äôs something you rarely find at the New York‚Äôs bars. Really satisfied.

Heaven sent!! First, the food is amazing! Second but not least, the staff are very attentive, polite, and go all out to make your meal enjoyable. Thanks to my Beautiful buddy Lillian and her husband for a great experience. Super Kudos to the MORRIS PARK INN!!!

Unbelievable place! Couldn‚Äôt recommend it enough. I love the fried seafood combo, but everything I‚Äôve eaten there is fantastic, I‚Äôve probably ate half the menu at this point.
The drinks are always perfect.
And they always make you feel like family when you walk in.
Highly recommend MPI!
Love it. Check out Vivi on Tipsy Tuesday üòÜ.  She makes the best drinks

Great food!! The bar looks beautiful! Good Luck Joey and Steve!!! I have known Joey forever and he is an amazing person and friend!!!  The atmosphere is fun and friendly!!!! Fun place to hang out and have some drinks and delicious food.

Awesome place.¬† I enjoyed the¬† atmosphere, loved the variety on the food menu two thumbs up on the great food. Also loved the variety of the drinks and draft beer at great prices. I enjoyed the jukebox love to play my jams when im having‚Ä¶

Great friendly neighborhood bar restaurant! Food is delicious and not over priced. Renovations make the bar feel lively and not dark like it used to be before new owners took over . Happening place! Highly recommended

Outstanding food!  The owners were amazing during the  pandemic doing such a phenomenal job keeping their customers fed and happy!!  Would def recommend you give them a try!!!  Can‚Äôt wait to go back in and enjoy a full on meal and drink when the ban is lifted!!!  Good job!!!

My mother recently dropped by for lunch and was really thrilled with the food. She said she had roast loin of pork with sauerkraut  and the freshest broccoli she ever tasted. She also raved about the Whiskey Sours.  Since she is in her nineties I assume she knows a good whiskey sour when she comes across one.

The bar looks amazing and we really enjoyed the wings and my favorite a very large pretzel with cheese and mustard. It's a great place to hang for any occasion or just to have a few drinks and chillüôÇ‚Ä¶
The food is delicious!!! The waitresses and bar tenders are very friendly. Joey is a good friend of our family and has always been a great person. Great location and atmosphere!!!

Just picked up 2 orders of corned beef and cabbage and a Sheppards pie. It was  Supposed to be corned beef, potato and cabbage. The corned beef was fine however both my wife and myself received 1 piece of potatoe the size of an egg, and 1/2 cup of cabbage. Next year we'll go back to the Golden Eagle. We'll be better off.

Wonderful Bar & Restaurant !! Great addition to the neighborhood and the staff is always so friendly and accommodating ! Will definitely be back soon !! PS... the wings are delicious and FULL of meat... highly recommend !!

This was my first time here and I really enjoyed myself. Jasmine, the bartender was so cool and amazing, she really made it fun. üëèüèΩüëèüèΩüëèüèΩüôåüèΩüôåüèΩüôåüèΩ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§. I will definitely return. A happy Brooklyniteü§óü§óü§ó‚Ä¶

Great Local Spot, Ray the bartender was a really nice guy. Food was pretty good for a bar - Beef Sliders and Mac N Cheese bites were very good.
Restaurant was Great atmosphere. Good food.  Service awesome    The bar was hopping too. Definately try this place.   They make everyone welcome
